trans-unit.source: PowerShell Cmdlets for the BizTalk Adapter Service
trans-unit.target: PowerShell Cmdlets for the BizTalk Adapter Service

trans-unit.source: Install and use the PowerShell cmdlets in <token>lobconnect</token>.
trans-unit.target: Install and use the PowerShell cmdlets in <token>lobconnect</token>.

trans-unit.source: The <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime Server utilizes the cmdlet (command-let) ability of PowerShell to expose the <token>lobrelay</token> and <token>lobtarget</token> entities.
trans-unit.target: The <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime Server utilizes the cmdlet (command-let) ability of PowerShell to expose the <token>lobrelay</token> and <token>lobtarget</token> entities.

trans-unit.source: Using PowerShell, Administrators can manage the Runtime Service and these LOB entities.
trans-unit.target: Using PowerShell, Administrators can manage the Runtime Service and these LOB entities.

trans-unit.source: Install the PowerShell cmdlets
trans-unit.target: Install the PowerShell cmdlets

trans-unit.source: Install Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: Install Windows PowerShell 3.0.

trans-unit.source: Run the <token>af_integration</token> setup file.
trans-unit.target: Run the <token>af_integration</token> setup file.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="10873203-56b3-445c-8340-ef073f5365f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Installing the Azure BizTalk Services SDK </link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="10873203-56b3-445c-8340-ef073f5365f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Installing the Azure BizTalk Services SDK </link>.

trans-unit.source: Additional
trans-unit.target: Additional

trans-unit.source: The PowerShell cmdlets are automatically installed when the <embeddedLabel>Tools</embeddedLabel> option is selected during the setup.
trans-unit.target: The PowerShell cmdlets are automatically installed when the <embeddedLabel>Tools</embeddedLabel> option is selected during the setup.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="10873203-56b3-445c-8340-ef073f5365f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Installing the Azure BizTalk Services SDK </link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="10873203-56b3-445c-8340-ef073f5365f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Installing the Azure BizTalk Services SDK </link>.

trans-unit.source: When the installation completes, the <legacyBold>C:\Program Files\Windows Azure BizTalk Services Tools</legacyBold> folder is created.
trans-unit.target: When the installation completes, the <legacyBold>C:\Program Files\Windows Azure BizTalk Services Tools</legacyBold> folder is created.

trans-unit.source: This folder contains the <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime PowerShell module.
trans-unit.target: This folder contains the <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime PowerShell module.

trans-unit.source: Use the PowerShell cmdlets
trans-unit.target: Use the PowerShell cmdlets

trans-unit.source: Select Windows PowerShell and Run as Administrator.
trans-unit.target: Select Windows PowerShell and Run as Administrator.

trans-unit.source: If User Account Control (UAC) is enabled, select Yes is prompted to proceed.
trans-unit.target: If User Account Control (UAC) is enabled, select Yes is prompted to proceed.

trans-unit.source: Type: <legacyBold>import-module "C:\Program Files\Windows Azure BizTalk Services Tools\Microsoft.BizTalk.Adapter.Services.Powershell.dll"</legacyBold>
trans-unit.target: Type: <legacyBold>import-module "C:\Program Files\Windows Azure BizTalk Services Tools\Microsoft.BizTalk.Adapter.Services.Powershell.dll"</legacyBold>

trans-unit.source: Select Enter.
trans-unit.target: Select Enter.

trans-unit.source: To view the cmdlets, type: <legacyBold>get-module</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: To view the cmdlets, type: <legacyBold>get-module</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>get-module</legacyBold> displays the <token>lobtarget</token> and <token>lobrelay</token> cmdlets supported by the <token>lobconnect</token> module.
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>get-module</legacyBold> displays the <token>lobtarget</token> and <token>lobrelay</token> cmdlets supported by the <token>lobconnect</token> module.

trans-unit.source: Additional
trans-unit.target: Additional

trans-unit.source: The <token>lobconnect</token> Windows PowerShell module name is Microsoft.BizTalk.Adapter.Services.Powershell.dll.
trans-unit.target: The <token>lobconnect</token> Windows PowerShell module name is Microsoft.BizTalk.Adapter.Services.Powershell.dll.

trans-unit.source: PowerShell scripts written using the Preview-version of the cmdlets may fail after upgrading.
trans-unit.target: PowerShell scripts written using the Preview-version of the cmdlets may fail after upgrading.

trans-unit.source: When using <legacyBold>import-module</legacyBold>, modules exist only when the PowerShell command window is open; which is the current PowerShell session.
trans-unit.target: When using <legacyBold>import-module</legacyBold>, modules exist only when the PowerShell command window is open; which is the current PowerShell session.

trans-unit.source: When the PowerShell command window is closed, the session is closed and the module is removed.
trans-unit.target: When the PowerShell command window is closed, the session is closed and the module is removed.

trans-unit.source: PowerShell Best Practices
trans-unit.target: PowerShell Best Practices

trans-unit.source: Case sensitivity
trans-unit.target: Case sensitivity

trans-unit.source: PowerShell commands are <legacyBold>not</legacyBold> case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: PowerShell commands are <legacyBold>not</legacyBold> case-sensitive.

trans-unit.source: As a result, focus on the correct syntax and spelling.
trans-unit.target: As a result, focus on the correct syntax and spelling.

trans-unit.source: Cmdlet Parameter Shortcuts
trans-unit.target: Cmdlet Parameter Shortcuts

trans-unit.source: By default, PowerShell allows any unique prefix for the cmdlet parameters.
trans-unit.target: By default, PowerShell allows any unique prefix for the cmdlet parameters.

trans-unit.source: For example, <legacyBold>-f</legacyBold>, <legacyBold>-fo</legacyBold> and <legacyBold>-for</legacyBold> can all be used as a shortcut for the -ForceDelete parameter.
trans-unit.target: For example, <legacyBold>-f</legacyBold>, <legacyBold>-fo</legacyBold> and <legacyBold>-for</legacyBold> can all be used as a shortcut for the -ForceDelete parameter.

trans-unit.source: Install Runtime & Tools
trans-unit.target: Install Runtime & Tools

trans-unit.source: Install on the same server.
trans-unit.target: Install on the same server.

trans-unit.source: This option allows you to manage the <token>lobconnect</token> components in the cloud and use the PowerShell cmdlets (command-lets) on a central server.
trans-unit.target: This option allows you to manage the <token>lobconnect</token> components in the cloud and use the PowerShell cmdlets (command-lets) on a central server.

trans-unit.source: The Developer portion of the Setup should be installed on a separate computer.
trans-unit.target: The Developer portion of the Setup should be installed on a separate computer.

trans-unit.source: The goal is to separate the development tasks from the runtime tasks.
trans-unit.target: The goal is to separate the development tasks from the runtime tasks.

trans-unit.source: Service Bus Namespace
trans-unit.target: Service Bus Namespace

trans-unit.source: When using the –Namespace parameter, always enter the <token>sb2</token> namespace.
trans-unit.target: When using the –Namespace parameter, always enter the <token>sb2</token> namespace.

trans-unit.source: get-help <legacyItalic>cmdletName</legacyItalic> -full
trans-unit.target: get-help <legacyItalic>cmdletName</legacyItalic> -full

trans-unit.source: Use -full to get detailed information on the cmdlet, including examples and a description of each parameter.
trans-unit.target: Use -full to get detailed information on the cmdlet, including examples and a description of each parameter.

trans-unit.source: about_ topics
trans-unit.target: about_ topics

trans-unit.source: The PowerShell <legacyBold>about_</legacyBold> help topics are available in text format at C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\en-US.
trans-unit.target: The PowerShell <legacyBold>about_</legacyBold> help topics are available in text format at C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\en-US.

trans-unit.source: In This Section
trans-unit.target: In This Section

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell Cmdlet Help Topics
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell Cmdlet Help Topics
